A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Well you can tell Disney has firm control of the franchise. It’s essentially a 3 hour Jar Jar Binks movie. It is made for kids and not the lovers of the original trilogy. It once again try’s to “steal” from the originals and the story line is predictable. The best thing to come from it is I am not anxious with anticipation for the next one to come out.
